metadata.title: CVE-2021-3620 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A flaw was found in Ansible Engine's ansible-connection module, where sensitive information such as the Ansible user credentials is disclosed by default in the traceback error message. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to confidentiality.

criterions.comment: ansible package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
ansible-base package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
